alert.note: Alert for Banner; Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 2:30PM CDT until July 08 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Scotts Bluff County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... West central Morrill County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northern Banner County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 200 PM MDT. * At 129 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Minatare Campground, or 9 miles east of Scottsbluff, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Minatare, Lake Minatare Campground, Moomaws Corner, Scottsbluff Airport, Lake Minatare, Melbeta and McGrew. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
